body_html:
@blester125 I am trying to repro this issue via the example you provided, but ran into an error lol would you like to take a look?

>>> mead-train --config config/conll-bio.json --time
Task: [tagger]
Traceback (most recent call last):
  File "/home/weiyang/anaconda2/bin/mead-train", line 11, in <module>
    load_entry_point('deep-baseline', 'console_scripts', 'mead-train')()
  File "/home/weiyang/baseline/python/mead/trainer.py", line 27, in main
    task = mead.Task.get_task_specific(task_name, args.logging, args.settings)
  File "/home/weiyang/baseline/python/mead/tasks.py", line 69, in get_task_specific
    config = Task.TASK_REGISTRY[task](logging_config, mead_config)
  File "/home/weiyang/baseline/python/mead/tasks.py", line 304, in __init__
    super(TaggerTask, self).__init__(logging_config, mead_settings_config, **kwargs)
  File "/home/weiyang/baseline/python/mead/tasks.py", line 34, in __init__
    raise Exception("Expected either a mead settings file or a JSON object")
Exception: Expected either a mead settings file or a JSON object

Sounds like there is lacking a mead settings file..

body:
@blester125 I am trying to repro this issue via the example you provided, but ran into an error lol would you like to take a look?
```
>>> mead-train --config config/conll-bio.json --time
Task: [tagger]
Traceback (most recent call last):
  File "/home/weiyang/anaconda2/bin/mead-train", line 11, in <module>
    load_entry_point('deep-baseline', 'console_scripts', 'mead-train')()
  File "/home/weiyang/baseline/python/mead/trainer.py", line 27, in main
    task = mead.Task.get_task_specific(task_name, args.logging, args.settings)
  File "/home/weiyang/baseline/python/mead/tasks.py", line 69, in get_task_specific
    config = Task.TASK_REGISTRY[task](logging_config, mead_config)
  File "/home/weiyang/baseline/python/mead/tasks.py", line 304, in __init__
    super(TaggerTask, self).__init__(logging_config, mead_settings_config, **kwargs)
  File "/home/weiyang/baseline/python/mead/tasks.py", line 34, in __init__
    raise Exception("Expected either a mead settings file or a JSON object")
Exception: Expected either a mead settings file or a JSON object
```
Sounds like there is lacking a `mead settings file`..
